name: Argentina '76
description:
____________________

Year 1976. Buenos-Aires, Argentina. General Jorge Videla has overthrown Isabel Peron. City's streets became a warzone, militaries now control everything. You're just another paperworker who arrived at work too late - and it saved your life...

____________________

- RELIVE the bloody events of 1976 military coup

- EXPERIENCE unique atmosphere never seen before

- FIGHT Junta's assassins in 8 detailed levels

- ESCAPE form overwhelming horror

____________________

Controls:

WSAD - move

Q/E - peek left/right

Space - jump

Enter - use

Right Mouse Button - take object/aim weapon

Left Mouse Button - shoot

____________________

Special thanks to The Game Creators Team. Any copyrighted materials belong to their respective owners. This game is 100% free and can't be sold at any price!
